title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. I, pt. 30 - Tenure Areas and Annual Professional Performance Reviews For Classroom Teachers and Building Principals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. I, pt. 30 - Tenure Areas and Annual Professional Performance Reviews For Classroom Teachers and Building Principals

State Regulations

Subpart 30-1 - Tenure Areas (§ 30-1.1 to 30-1.13)

Subpart 30-2 - Annual Professional Performance Reviews of Classroom Teachers and Building Principals Conducted Prior to the 2019-20 School Year or for Annual Professional Performance Reviews Conducted Pursuant to a Collective Bargaining Agreement Entered into on or Before April 12, 2019 Which Remains in Effect on or After April 12, 2019 Until a Subsequent Agreement is Reached (§ 30-2.1 to 30-2.17)

Subpart 30-3 - Annual Teacher and Principal Evaluations for the 2019-20 through the 2031-2032 School Year (§ 30-3.1 to 30-3.17)

Subpart 30-4 - STANDARDS-BASED EDUCATOR EVALUATION AND PROFESSIONAL SUPPORT ("STEPS") PLANS BEGINNING IN THE 2024-2025 SCHOOL YEAR AND THEREAFTER (§ 30-4.1 to 30-4.12)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. I, pt. 30

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§101, 207, 215, 305, 3012-b, -c; L. 2008, ch. 57; L. 2010, ch. 103

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Subpart 30-1 - Tenure Areas (§ 30-1.1 to 30-1.13)

Subpart 30-2 - Annual Professional Performance Reviews of Classroom Teachers and Building Principals Conducted Prior to the 2019-20 School Year or for Annual Professional Performance Reviews Conducted Pursuant to a Collective Bargaining Agreement Entered into on or Before April 12, 2019 Which Remains in Effect on or After April 12, 2019 Until a Subsequent Agreement is Reached (§ 30-2.1 to 30-2.17)

Subpart 30-3 - Annual Teacher and Principal Evaluations for the 2019-20 School Year and Thereafter (§ 30-3.1 to 30-3.17)

Subpart 30-4 - [Effective until 4/3/2025] STANDARDS-BASED EDUCATOR EVALUATION AND PROFESSIONAL SUPPORT ("STEPS") PLANS BEGINNING IN THE 2024-2025 SCHOOL YEAR AND THEREAFTER (§ 30-4.1 to 30-4.12)

Subpart 30-4 - [Effective 4/3/2025] STANDARDS-BASED EDUCATOR EVALUATION AND PROFESSIONAL SUPPORT ("STEPS") PLANS BEGINNING IN THE 2024-2025 SCHOOL YEAR AND THEREAFTER
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. I, pt. 30

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§101, 207, 215, 305, 3012-b, -c; L. 2008, ch. 57; L. 2010, ch. 103
